page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF......
page.content: { A PUPIL AT PAGE HILL MIDDLE SCHOOL After washing and dressing,I watch Breakfast T.V. until 08:15. Then I call on a friend who walks with me to school. Registration is at 08:55. We have a short break at 10:40-11:00,and a lunch break from 12:00-13:15. At 15:30 I go home for tea, then play with my friends. {A FARMER'S SON} In the holidays I get up at 06:00 and go with Dad to market,but otherwise I have my breakfast and go out with my friend. We ride our motorbikes,or make a swing,or play football.In the afternoon we go fishing until 19.00.
